message: Let's start fair. I get 90% and you get 10%.
My turn!  How about a more even split this time?  I'll take 70% and you get 30%.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 80% and you get 20%.  It's a better deal for you than the last round, and closer to my original offer.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm losing money with every round we play, and you know it! I'm offering you 350,000, take it or leave it. This is my final offer.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40. I'm taking a bigger loss than you with each round, so this is a better deal for you.  Let's end this.
